name: Holi-Zone 97
description:
Holi-Zone 97 has been saved from digital obscurity and its restored servers now live in the public domain. Check out the most popular holiday-themed MMO of 1997. 64kb internet connection recommended.

Graphics, design, programming, and Music by VaporShark

Additional tracks by Mousy Kissed. https://mousykissed.bandcamp.com/

PS1 shader derived from the work of MenacingMecha: https://github.com/MenacingMecha/godot-psx-style-demo

Software used: Godot 3.4, Blender 2.8, Audacity, Gimp, Dialogic Plugin for Godot.
